public class ECNumber
extends ClassificationIdentifier
implements Comparable<ECNumber>

ECNumber.java

Object to unify, store and compare the Enzyme Commission (EC) classification system

Author:
johnmay

Field Detail

MATCHING_NONE

public static final int MATCHING_NONE
Value to indicate compared values have no match (see. compare(ECNumber ec1))

Example Code: 

 if(ec1.compare(ec2) == ECNumber.MATCHING_NONE ) {
   // logic
 }

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MATCHING_CLASS

public static final int MATCHING_CLASS
Value to indicate compared values are matching at the class level (see. compare(ECNumber ec1))

Example Code: 

 ECNumber ec1 = new ECNumber("1.2.4.-");
 ECNumber ec1 = new ECNumber("1.1.-.-");
 if( ec1.compare(ec2) == ECNumber.MATCHING_CLASS ) {
   // logic
 }

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MATCHING_SUBCLASS

public static final int MATCHING_SUBCLASS
Value to indicate compared values are matching at the class level (see. compare(ECNumber ec1))

Example Code: 

 ECNumber ec1 = new ECNumber("1.2.2.5");
 ECNumber ec1 = new ECNumber("1.2.4.1");
 if( ec1.compare(ec2) == ECNumber.MATCHING_SUBCLASS ) {
   // logic
 }

See Also:
